content.raw:
We have a minor Python 3 compat change, and I’ll confirm that there haven’t been any other changes other than spielman-fork-compatibility ones in the other lab, then we can get this merged.

Will also change the BLACS tab to check for BLACS 2.6.0 for image output support.
content.html:
We have a minor Python 3 compat change, and I’ll confirm that there haven’t been any other changes other than spielman-fork-compatibility ones in the other lab, then we can get this merged.

Will also change the BLACS tab to check for BLACS 2.6.0 for image output support.
